PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2005-17152005-09-29HERITAGE,  ,  ,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of DONALD R. SOBEY of Stellarton, Nova Scotia, as Chairperson of the Board of Trustees of the National Gallery of Canada to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective November 19, 2005.
AttachmentsAttachment
